Posts.Content:
Lauri:
Thank you for the email...Its hard not to worry...But I agree I'm glad my doctor is doing what he is doing....
Your email made me feel better already...:)
Oh we got 15 inches here Lake Villa, IL (Chicago)
Julie
Posts.Title: New-Scared

Posts.Content:
Hi:
Well it took me 3 hours to dig my car out this morning...
Yes we celebrate easter, love it...Just made my ham for tomorrow as I take it to my moms. She is very ill and I'm her caregiver so I make it here and bring it over to her house...
yes I'm trying hard not to panick....Keeping the faith.
Happy Easter
J
